scripts.test: npm run test:local && npm run test:prod && npm run test:ltc
scripts.test:prod: gourmet build --verbosity 1 --stage prod && tape test/*_test.js --stage prod --verbosity 1
scripts.test:ltc: gourmet build --verbosity 1 --stage ltc --save-webpack-stats && tape test/*_test.js --stage ltc --verbosity 1
